content: the photo-rich pattern is free on the website 1 an optional pdf 2 is available for $1 99-$3 99 depending on if there s a sale in effect it s the perfect teddy with an added flair of a buttoned scarf the pattern is very simple using the following basic crochet techniques/ stitches * magic_ring * chain * single_crochet * double_crochet * increase * single_crochet decrease so you can easily whip it off your hook in 1 day if you suddenly get invited to a baby shower or something d the original pattern calls for sport-weight acrylic but you can easily replace it with other yarns with different * fiber content but make sure it is soft and washable if you are making it for a baby * and/ or weight this will simply change the size of the finished toy you can even play with it a bit and make a whole set of different sizes to create your own bear family don t forget to change the hook size accordingly and keep in mind that heavier weight will use up more yarn both in weight and yardage and vice-versa you will require some additional materials * fiberfill or other kind of stuffing * safety eyes/ nose can be replaced with embroidery * a button for the scarf optional you can leave the scarf hanging down or embellish it with mini-pompoms or tassels * tapestry needle to sew the pieces together 1 https //amigurumi today/crochet-cuddle-me-bear-amigurumi-pattern/ 2 https //shop amigurumi today/collections/crochet-bears-patterns/products/cuddle-me-bear-amigurumi-pattern-printable-pdf
